mapper.select: SELECT p_no, p_brand, p_cate, p_name, p_img, p_grade FROM products ORDER BY p_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT products (M_NO, P_BRAND, P_CATE, P_NAME, P_IMG, P_DETAIL, P_GRADE, P_REG) VALUES (9999, #{p_brand}, #{p_cate}, #{p_name}, #{p_img}, #{p_detail}, #{p_grade}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET P_BRAND = #{p_brand}, P_CATE = #{p_cate}, P_NAME = #{p_name}, P_IMG = #{p_img}, P_DETAIL = #{p_detail}, P_GRADE = #{p_grade}, P_REG = SYSDATE() WHERE P_NO = #{p_no}
